tha-ap489:8.4: etamatthaṃ pucchiṃsu maṃ → etamatthamapucchu maṃ (bj) | etamatthaṃ apucchisuṃ (s2, s3) | etamatthaṃ apucchiṃsu (mr)
tha-ap489:9.1: Pulinena → puḷinena (s2, s3, pts1), kato thūpo → kate thūpe (bj)
tha-ap489:10.1: Niddiṭṭhā nu → niddiṭṭhā no (bj, pts1) | diṭṭhā no vo (s2, s3)
tha-ap489:19.2: atulā ca → atulyā ca (bj, pts1) | te (s2, s3, mr)
tha-ap489:27.2: byādhinā → vyādhito (bj) | byādhiko (s2, s3) | byādhito (pts1, mr)
